typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Oid as string,
		Oname as string,
		amount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	wildcardPaths:['order_details.txt'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		Orderid = Oid,
		Ordername = Oname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Oid as string,
		Oname as string,
		amount as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['order_details.txt'],
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		Oid = Orderid,
		Oname = Ordername
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> moviedata
moviedata filter(toInteger(year) >= 1910 && toInteger(year) <= 2000) ~> FilterYears
FilterYears aggregate(groupBy(year),
	AverageComedyRating = avg(toInteger(Rating))) ~> Avgbyyear
FilterYears aggregate(groupBy(genres),
	AvgbyGeners = avg(toInteger(Rating))) ~> AggbyGeners
Avgbyyear sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['avgratingbyyear'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkavgratingbyyead
AggbyGeners sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['avgratingbygeners'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkavgbygeners

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer '##0',
		Rating as integer '##0',
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer '##0'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	skipLines: 1) ~> movesdata
movesdata filter(toInteger(year) >= 1910 && toInteger(year) <= 2000) ~> FilterYears
FilterYears aggregate(groupBy(year),
	AverageComedyRating = avg(toInteger(Rating))) ~> AggregateComedyRatings
FilterYears aggregate(groupBy(genres),
	AverageComedyRating = avg(toInteger(Rating))) ~> AggregateBygenres
AggregateComedyRatings sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['movierating'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkblob
AggregateBygenres sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['genrerating'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkgneres
